source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Modern Watercolor Techniques: Create On-Trend Paintings
items.headline: Explore your creativity and expand your painting skills with these step-by-step watercolor techniques!
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]
objectives_summary: Step-by-step watercolor techniques
Art supplies I recommend, including paint brands, paper, and brush types
Tips for sketching out the perfect composition

items.title: Learn How to Draw: Foundational Techniques
items.headline: The principles of drawing broken down into my three key principles: Proportion, Angle and Tone
objectives_summary: By the end, students will learn how to effectively use the three key principles of drawing: Proportion, Angle and Tone.

items.title: Hygge. The Art of Comfort & Happiness. Creative Projects.

visible_instructors.name: Aerie
visible_instructors.title: Aerie North
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist ♦ Art Teacher ♦ Author ♦ Fibre Arts

items.headline: Hand over hand creative project learning.  Making happiness a priority through comfort, creating, and connecting.
objectives_summary: Students will be able to make a several warm cozy hygge comforts.
Students will learn that taking part in an activity that they normally wouldn't (knitting, arts & crafts) exercises their entrenpreneurial muscles.

items.title: Secret Tricks to Pouring Acrylic Paint

visible_instructors.name: Nancy
visible_instructors.title: Nancy Reyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Painter, International Author & Art Instructor

items.headline: Learn to Achieve Special Painting Effects with Acrylic Pouring
objectives_summary: Learn to create very cool painting effects!
Contemporary painting techniques that use poured acrylic paint.
Tips to achieve marbelized effects, and clear smooth finishing coats.

items.title: Making Polymer Clay Statement Jewelry
items.headline: How To Make a Beautiful Statement Jewelry Collection With Polymer Clay
objectives_summary: My start to finish process for creating a beautiful statement earring collection
How to work with polymer clay to create stunning statement earrings
Slab Making For Beginners

items.title: Beginner Impressionism Seascape Painting Water Mixable Oil
items.headline: Simple Project for Beginner Oil Painters, step by step, impasto seascape palette knife painting easy clean up .
objectives_summary: At the end of this course students will be able to  create a beautiful seascape using a Palette Knife using lots of texture for themselves.
Students will learn to play and creative with less pressure by using colors and freeing up your expectations.
Students will be able to create a finished Oil Painting with just the very basics.

items.title: Digital Art : Painting A Pet Portrait
items.headline: Learn How To Paint Realistic Fur
objectives_summary: How to quickly sketch the shape of an animal
How to paint realistic fur
Tips for editing your colors and creating 3D effects

items.title: Painting Wild Places with Watercolors:  Crater Lake

visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.title: Gary Spetz
visible_instructors.job_title: Signature Member of the National Watercolor Society

items.headline: Step-by-step instructional videos with a downloadable Color Painting Reference and full-size Traceable Drawing Guide.
objectives_summary: Successfully paint a bold, dynamic, detailed watercolor landscape.
Gain confidence in controlling the often unweilding medium of watercolor.

items.title: Learn To Juggle 3 Balls (+25 Other Tricks!)
items.headline: In this course you'll learn how to juggle 25+ tricks from an expert that has spent years of his life practicing!
objectives_summary: Juggle 3 balls comfortably
Perform an entertaining routine that incorporates the various tricks you've learned.

items.title: Color Explorations and Color Theory
items.headline: Color Mixing and Applications
objectives_summary: Knowledge and understanding of the color wheel
Learn to mix any color from your primary colors
Understand juxtaposing color

items.title: Watercolor Daisy: Paint a Realistic Pink Flower Step by Step
items.headline: Learn color mixing rules and layering technique to create a realistic flower
objectives_summary: How to choose colors for your painting
The difference between cold and warm colors, and how to use them
How to mix colors to achieve darker tone

items.title: Drawing Animals using Pen, Inks and Watercolors
items.headline: Sketching and painting animals with exquisite textures using pens, inks and watercolors
objectives_summary: Basics of sketching animals
Sketching and shading animals using pens
Using inks for shading animal sketches

items.title: How to Draw Birds Vol 1 - Parrot, Kingfisher, Robin & Owl
items.headline: Learn to draw a variety of birds with stunning results using pastel pencils with Colin Bradley. 4 Subjects in 1!
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw a variety of Birds
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Ink Pen and Watercolour for Beginners and Beyond
items.headline: How to draw with a waterproof ink pen and then add a watercolour wash in a fresh & loose way.
objectives_summary: Appreciate the vitality you can achieve in the usage of ink and watercolour.
Understand the impact of light on the subject.
Be able to paint/draw scenes of which you can be proud

items.title: Nightscape Watercolor Panting for Beginners with LIVE demo
items.headline: Watercolor painting course for art lover, beginner level, art collage students and passionate people
objectives_summary: The students will students learn Watercolor composition and drawing.
Improving their basic painting.
How to handle watercolor brushing.

items.title: Plein Air Essentials - Pastel Supplement

visible_instructors.name: Michael Chesley
visible_instructors.title: Michael Chesley Johnson AIS PSA MPAC
visible_instructors.display_name: Michael Chesley Johnson AIS PSA MPAC

items.headline: If you've taken the Plein Air Essentials course and are looking for a course specific to pastel, this is it!
objectives_summary: By the time you finish this course, you will have learned some advanced techniques that will help you paint in pastel in the field.
